text: Bernardo Rocha de Rezende known as Bernardinho (born August 25, 1959) is a Brazilian volleyball coach and former player. He is the current coach of both Brazil national volleyball team and the female volleyball team Rio de Janeiro VÃ´lei Clube. Rezende is the most successful coach in the history of volleyball, accumulating more than 30 major titles in twenty-year career directing the Brazilian male and female teams.Bernardinho . sports- reference.com ==References== ==Other websites== * Coach profile Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian volleyball players Category:Volleyball coaches Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro
title: Bernardo Rezende
